subject: Boxing
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Rau’shee Warren beat Violito Payla of the Philippines, 25-11, yesterday at the World Boxing Championships in Chicago, earning a spot in Beijing next year in the flyweight division. Warren, who was 17 when he competed in Athens in 2004, can become the first American boxer since in 1976 to participate in two Olympics.
